layer that expects ﬂattened feature vectors.
# define model
visible = Input(shape=(n_input,))
dense = Dense(100, activation=' relu' )(visible)
Listing 7.51: Example of deﬁning an input model.
We can then deﬁne one output layer for each of the three series that we wish to forecast,
where each output submodel will forecast a single time step.
# define output 1
output1 = Dense(1)(dense)
# define output 2
output2 = Dense(1)(dense)
# define output 2
output3 = Dense(1)(dense)
